title: Detection of sulfur mustard simulant by trisaryl phosphoric triamide-based resin using a quartz crystal microbalance sensor
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,7720-7727
DOI: 10.1039/D3RA08852A, Paper
Open Access

Jaeyoung Heo, Jin Hyun Park, Sun Gu Song, Seongwoo Lee, Seongyeop Lim, Chang Young Lee, Han Yong Bae, Changsik Song
We have developed a receptor with a triamide structure that demonstrates superior detection capability at room temperature compared to existing research on 2-CEES gas.
